entities.name: gaunt shack
entities.description: The Gaunt shack is mentioned as a place where Harry would visit first.

entities.name: nagini
entities.description: Nagini is described as a snake that Harry takes with him to the Gaunt shack.

entities.name: parseltongue
entities.description: Parseltongue is mentioned as the language used by Harry to call Nagini.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is one of the people looking down at Harry on the bank of the lake.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is one of the people looking down at Harry on the bank of the lake.

relationships.description: Harry would visit the Gaunt shack first.
Harry takes Nagini with him to the Gaunt shack.
Harry uses Parseltongue to call Nagini.
Ron and Hermione are looking down at Harry together.
Harry is being looked down at by Ron.
Harry is being looked down at by Hermione.
